${ModID}:Arson.NAME: Arson
${ModID}:Arson.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Unfreeze any *Frozen cards in hand (reducing their cost to 0 until played).

${ModID}:ExtendedStall.NAME: Extended Stall
${ModID}:ExtendedStall.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Freeze the highest-cost card in hand.
${ModID}:ExtendedStall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Freeze the highest-cost card in hand.

${ModID}:FlashFreeze.NAME: Flash Freeze
${ModID}:FlashFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Freeze a card in hand.

${ModID}:Plunge.NAME: Plunge
${ModID}:Plunge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel a Frost.

${ModID}:Prime.NAME: Prime
${ModID}:Prime.DESCRIPTION: Gain an Orb slot. NL Whenever you Channel an orb, trigger its passive effect.
${ModID}:Prime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots. NL Whenever you Channel an orb, trigger its passive effect.

${ModID}:FrozenSnack.NAME: Frozen Snack
${ModID}:FrozenSnack.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Snack to your hand and ${ModID}:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrozenSnack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Snack+ to your hand and ${ModID}:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hailstorm.NAME: Hailstorm
${ModID}:Hailstorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Channel !M! Frost.

${ModID}:MegaChill.NAME: MegaChill
${ModID}:MegaChill.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Frost for each *Frozen card. NL ${ModID}:Freeze your hand.
